In site lead Dr. Altice , compare two model provide HIV care buprenorphine treatment . Assignments base participant ' city residence . In onsite ( integrate care ) model , participant receive buprenorphine , substance abuse counsel HIV care one location : Waterbury Hospital Infectious Disease Clinic . In off-site model ( non-integrated care ) buprenorphine induction , substance abuse counseling , HIV care provide separate location : Community Health Care Van ( CHCV ) , Yale AIDS Program , patient ' HIV provider , respectively . Data collect interview participant , review medical record , survey interview clinician .
